description: ACAN for Nunavut Fuels  AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-10-28 at 2 p.m. EDT. All bids submitted after 2 p.m. EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
